articles.author: William Sanchez
articles.title: Media Unload on Rudy’s Boozy Interview
articles.description:
Howie Kurtz on Rudy Giuliani's rambling interview over drinks with New York magazine, Elizabeth Warren's hypocritical fundraising record and Boeing CEO ousted for 737 MAX disasters.



Follow Howie on Twitter: @HowardKurtz

For more #MediaBuzz click here

articles.author: Talia Kaplan
articles.title: No need for a Senate impeachment trial, says former Bush adviser Brad Blakeman
articles.description: Brad Blakeman, who served as deputy assistant to President George W. Bush, reacted on Thursday to the House Speaker’s move to withhold the articles of impeachment against President Trump from the Senate saying, “Nancy Pelosi has no leverage over the Senate.”
articles.content:
Nancy Pelosi's stunning move to withhold from the Senate articles of impeachment against President Trump is stunning because the House speaker "has no leverage," said Brad Blakeman, who served as deputy assistant to President George W. Bush.
Blakeman, an adv… [+3721 chars]

articles.title: 'Peloton husband' gets real-life girlfriend a Peloton for Christmas
articles.content:
What else did she expect?
The actor who played the husband in the infamous Peloton bike commercial got his real-life girlfriend a not so surprising Christmas present. Hopefully, his girlfriend’s year with the bike goes better than his on-screen wife’s did.

articles.title: From Ukraine to Virginia: The top 7 political scandals of 2019
articles.description: As 2019 comes to a close, so does another year of jaw-dropping, and in some cases historic, political scandals.
articles.content: As 2019 comes to a close, so does another year of jaw-dropping, and in some cases historic, political scandals. While the biggest was undoubtedly the chain of events leading to President Trump’s impeachment, the commander-in-chief was hardly the only politica… [+8237 chars]

articles.description: A Texas man was arrested Monday after video of him appearing to fire a gun out the window of a moving vehicle days earlier went viral on social media.
articles.content:

articles.title: Boston Celtics' Marcus Smart details painful eye injury: 'I thought I was going blind for a while'
articles.content:

articles.description: Venezuela – once one of the more prosperous countries in Latin America – has been driven into such economic and political turmoil that its currency is no longer of any use to those trying to buy essentials to survive.

articles.title: Man chased from Florida home after grabbing girl, 11, in Christmas Eve break-in attempt
articles.description: A man from Micronesia has been arrested after forcing his way into a Florida home on Christmas Eve and nearly snatching an 11-year-old girl before being chased off by her father, authorities said.

articles.title: Former CIA officer on North Korea falling short on 'Christmas gift' to US: 'The threat is real'
articles.description: Former CIA officer Bryan Dean Wright reacted Thursday to North Korea falling short on its missile launch threat that the regime has dubbed a “Christmas gift” saying, “The threat is real.”
articles.content:
